Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Combine all the ingredients thoroughly, then pour the mixture into an uncooked 9-inch pie crust.

Bake the pie at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes. The pie may quiver but it's normal. The top will be puffed up initially and will settle as it cools. Serve at room temperature for the best taste.
